data.why:
I want to publish the Mioga2 software (http://www.mioga2.org). It
    is a groupware application written to work with mod_perl/Apache
    (basicaly : three mod_perl handlers, plus a lot of applications
    modules). It uses a lot of Perl modules and can be integrated in
    other applications. I need to find contributors to help translate in
    english (or other languages).

    Best regards
